meanings.definition: In a sentimental or wistful manner, typically when recalling a past time or event.
meanings.sent1: She looked at the old photographs nostalgically, remembering the good times.
meanings.sent2: He smiled nostalgically as he flipped through the pages of his childhood diary.
meanings.sent3: Nostalgically, she tried to fit into her favorite dress from high school, but it was too small.
meanings.sent4: The melody of the song wrapped around her heart nostalgically, taking her back to her first dance.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh cookies baking in the oven filled the house nostalgically, bringing back memories of holidays past.
